mil3.6.9:1.2: “bhante nagasena, yam panetam brusi ‘samsaro’ti, katamo so samsaro”ti?
mil3.6.9:1.3: “Idha, maharaja, jato idheva marati, idha mato annatra uppajjati, tahim jato tahimyeva marati, tahim mato annatra uppajjati, evam kho, maharaja, samsaro hoti”ti.
mil3.6.9:1.5: “Yatha, maharaja, kocideva puriso pakkam ambam khaditva atthim ropeyya, tato mahanto ambarukkho nibbattitva phalani dadeyya, atha so puriso tatopi pakkam ambam khaditva atthim ropeyya, tatopi mahanto ambarukkho nibbattitva phalani dadeyya, evametesam rukkhanam koti na pannayati;
mil3.6.9:1.6: evameva kho, maharaja, idha jato idheva marati, idha mato annatra uppajjati, tahim jato tahimyeva marati, tahim mato annatra uppajjati, evam kho, maharaja, samsaro hoti”ti.
